    public class HeaterSensorDataConnector
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.DataConnector
implements HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorRequiredPullCI
    The class HeaterSensorDataConnector implements the connector for the HeaterSensorDataCI component data interface, and as such must implement the HeaterSensorDataCI.HeaterSensorRequiredPullCI pull interface.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant
